page.title: 16Filming "Pickwick Papers".
page.content:
{Last August}I was lucky enough to be in the{Television series}of {"Pickwick Papers"}by Charles Dickens.
The series was{partly filmed}at {Stanley Hall}near Bridgnorth.The Hall was{chosen}for filming because the directors thought it was like{Dingley {Dell}in the book.They only took film of the{outside}of the house.
Because I live nearby,I was allowed to{help}with the{scenery}and{acting.} I{played}Mr Winkle's{cousin}and had to {speak}a few lines as well. When I {helped}get the{scenes ready}I worked with Mike who was the{Scene Setter.
In one scene we had to{spray Stanley Hall with{foam}to make it look like{snow.}The{filming}took{two weeks.
